feed.subtitle: Currently Existing @ Earth, Milky Way Galaxy, Local Group, Virgo Supercluster"

entry.title: Why Have I Opened a Blog Site?

link.title: Why Have I Opened a Blog Site?

entry.content:
I have been working with Web App for quite sometime. I usually like to work with Node. But, I’ve been hearing awesome stuff about Ruby and its frameworks. My friend Anirban’s site inspired me to create this. I decided to mess around with it as a fun project. Jekyll seemed perfect for the job. It took a few hours to set up this static site.

I plan to post rants, takes on movie and tv shows, update my new favourite music albums every month and finally keep track on everything new I learn.
entry.summary: I have been working with Web App for quite sometime. I usually like to work with Node. But, I’ve been hearing awesome stuff about Ruby and its frameworks. My friend Anirban’s site inspired me to create this. I decided to mess around with it as a fun project. Jekyll seemed perfect for the job. It took a few hours to set up this static site.
